annotations.description: In this episode Leandro recreates a secret menu item at Trader Sam's called The Child. The Boys wonder about why Lucas Film would be short sighted as to send...
annotations.title: The Child, Don't Call it a Baby Yoda

textContent:
2oz (60ml) White Rum
.75oz (22.5ml) Midori
1oz (30ml) Pineapple Juice
.75oz (22.5ml) Lemon Juice
.25oz (7.5ml) Coconut Cream
Lime Wedge and Luxardo Cherry Garnish
Brown Napkin and String

Shake and strain into coupe. 
Garnish with limes and cherries to make a face
Tie brown napkin with string around stem of coupe

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KSO1yfWTd5U
title: The Child (Baby Yoda)
